data.title: By far the best in town.
data.text: Our favorite restaurant is a small place in the not so nice part of town, where you step into another time and place to enjoy real authentic and delicious Mexican cuisine. We go frequently and have never been disappointed. Excellent service. Extraordinary food. Surprisingly low prices.

data.title: Awesome Place! Great Prices
data.text: i've been going here since 1999.   This is REAL Mexican and in a Mexican neighborhood.  lots of seafood and weird dishes but i stick to the basics.  they give you free cheese dip... which is kind of like cheese soup... but it's good.   they use better cheese in their enchiladas, not the white stuff.   pleasant interior.  they grill the steak and chicken and chop it.   No Beer license but whatevs.

data.title: Authentic! The Real Deal.
data.text: Don't let the neighborhood or the exterior of the restaurant deter you. Walk in for a great surprise. Walls and tables are nicely painted in an interesting Mexican décor. And, the food is outstanding. Not the usual taco, tamale, burrito fare. Real authentic Mexican delights. Service is courteous and fast. Prices are very reasonable. Only place I recall eating where my tip matched the tab, simply because the prices are so reasonable and the service so good. This place should be featured on the TV show "Diners, Drive-ins and Dives". It's that good.
